name: National Australia Bank Limited
description: National Australia Bank Limited (NAB) is one of the largest financial institutions in Australia, providing a comprehensive range of banking and financial services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. Established in 1893, NAB has grown to become a key player in the Australian banking sector, offering services that include personal banking, business banking, corporate banking, and wealth management solutions. The bank operates across Australia and has a significant international presence, focusing on markets in New Zealand, Asia, and the UK. NAB is committed to innovation and customer service, leveraging technology to enhance the banking experience and improve efficiency. The bank has also made strides in sustainable finance, aiming to support customers in their transition to a low-carbon economy through various sustainable investment offerings and initiatives. NAB's mission is to be a customer-focused bank, dedicated to helping customers achieve their financial goals while contributing positively to the communities in which they operate.

seo.meta_title: National Australia Bank Limited | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore National Australia Bank Limited, a leading financial institution offering a wide range of banking and financial services across Australia and internationally.

faq.question: What services does NAB provide?
faq.answer: NAB provides personal banking, business banking, corporate banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of NAB?
faq.answer: Ross McEwan is the CEO of National Australia Bank Limited.

faq.question: Where is NAB headquartered?
faq.answer: NAB is headquartered in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.
